text.name: system_description
text.text: Nichibutsu, founded in 1953 in Japan, is a company known for its arcade games in the 80s, such as Crazy Climber and Moon Cresta. It stood out for innovative game concepts and a unique visual style. Though less influential today, Nichibutsu left its mark on the gaming industry with its original creations and its role in the golden age of arcade gaming.
